articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Spain reports second monkeypox-related death in Europe - MalaysiaNow
articles.description: This is thought to be only the third outside of Africa in the current outbreak.
articles.content:
Spain reported its second monkeypox-related death on Saturday, in what is thought to be Europe's second death from the disease and only the third outside of Africa in the current outbreak.
